With limited technical experience, he prefers clear and concise communication, making him keen on organizing simple tasks like arranging transportation to the clinic, especially as he pays great attention to details. His sedentary lifestyle has prompted him to seek out regular health check-ups, making this task a priority for both his health and well-being.
